T09sumagavu:1: SumAv_1: buddho bhagavān satkṛto gurukṛto mānitaḥ pūjito rājabhī rājāmātyair dhanibhiḥ pauraiḥ śreṣṭhibhiḥ sārthavāhair devair nāgair yakṣair asurair garuḍair gandharvaiḥ kinnarair mahoragair iti devanāgayakṣagandharvāsuragaruḍakinnaramahoragābhyarcito buddho bhagavān jñāto mahāpuṇyo lābhī cīvarapiṇḍapātraśayanāsanaglānapratyayabhaiṣajyapariṣkārāṇāṃ saśrāvakasaṃghaḥ śrāvastyāṃ viharati sma jetavane 'nāthapiṇḍadasyārāme.
T09sumagavu:2: SumAv_2: tena khalu punaḥ samayena śrāvastyām anāthapiṇḍado nāma gṛhapatiḥ prativasaty āḍhyo mahādhano mahābhogo vistīrṇaviśālaparigraho vaiśravaṇadhanasamudito vaiśravaṇadhanapratispardhī.
T09sumagavu:3: SumAv_3: tena sadṛśāt kulāt kalatram ānītam. sa tayā sārdhaṃ krīḍati ramate paricārayati. tasya krīḍato ramamāṇasya paricārayataḥ patnī āpannasattvā saṃvṛttā. sāṣṭānāṃ navānāṃ vā māsānām atyayāt prasūtā.
T09sumagavu:4: SumAv_4: dārikā jātā, abhirūpā darśanīyā prāsādikā sarvāṅgapratyaṅgopetā sā unnītā vardhitā mahatī saṃvṛttā, jñātibhir asyāḥ sumāgadheti nāma
T09sumagavu:6: SumAv_5: puṇḍravardhane 'pi ca nagare mūṣilo nāma gṛhapatiḥ prativasaty
T09sumagavu:7: āḍhyo mahādhano mahābhogo vistīrṇaviśālaparigraho vaiśravaṇadhanasamudito vaiśravaṇadhanapratispardhī.
T09sumagavu:8: SumAv_6: tasya putro vṛṣabhadatto nāma, so 'py abhirūpo darśanīyaḥ prāsādikaḥ sarvāṅgapratyaṅgopetaḥ, sa cānyatīrthyasaṃsargān nirgrantheṣv
T09sumagavu:10: SumAv_7: yadā bhagavatānuttare manuṣyadharme ṛddhiprātihāryaṃ tadā sarve
T09sumagavu:11: 'nyatīrthyā bhagnāḥ parājitāḥ pratyantaṃ samāśritāḥ, kecit gauḍikaṃ grāmaṃ, kecit puṇḍravardhanaṃ nagaraṃ, kecit bhadrikaṃ nagaram.
T09sumagavu:12: SumAv_8: sa ca gṛhapatiputro dainyenāvatiṣṭhate, sa ca nirgranthair
T09sumagavu:13: ucyate: kim arthaṃ tvaṃ no vivāhayasīti. sa provāca: patnī me sadṛśī na
T09sumagavu:14: vidyate. ta ūcur: anāthapiṇḍadasya duhitā sumāgadhā nāmāsti, sāpi abhirūpā darśanīyā prāsādikā janapadakalyāṇīsadṛśī, tāṃ prārthayeti.
T09sumagavu:15: SumAv_9: tato 'sau sahaśravaṇād eva tasyāṃ saṃraktacitto babhūva. yāvad anyatīrthikaveśaṃ kṛtvānupūrveṇa śrāvastīm anuprāptaḥ, piṇḍapātram anuvicarann anāthapiṇḍadasya gṛhaṃ praviṣṭaḥ. sumāgadhā bhikṣāṃ gṛhītvā
T09sumagavu:16: nirgatā. sā tena dṛṣṭā. sahadarśanād evātīva saṃraktacitto babhūva. sa bhrāntena khorakena śaktuṃ pratigṛhnāti, mathitaṃ ca sikkāyāṃ.
T09sumagavu:17: SumAv_10: tataḥ sumāgadhā tam asaṃvṛtendriyaṃ dṛṣṭvā prahasitā, āha ca:
T09sumagavu:18: asaṃprajānā ime 'nyatīrthyā bhikṣāṃ pratigṛhṇantīti. tataḥ so 'pi tayā saha prahasito bhikṣāṃ gṛhītvā prakrāntaḥ.
T09sumagavu:19: SumAv_11: tataḥ puṇḍravardhanaṃ gatvā pitur niveditavān. tena sā dārikā
T09sumagavu:21: SumAv_12: anāthapiṇḍadena gṛhapatinā bhagavān pṛsṭaḥ. bhagavān āha:
T09sumagavu:22: gṛhapate, pravrajitām idam akaraṇīyam. api tu yadi sumāgadhā puṇḍravardhanaṃ yāsyati, tatrāpi buddhakāryaṃ kariṣyatīti.
T09sumagavu:23: SumAv_13: tato 'nāthapiṇḍadena gṛhapatinā sumāgadhā mahatā śrisamudayena vṛṣabhadattāya dattā, tenāpi svagṛhaṃ nītā.
T09sumagavu:24: SumAv_14: yāvad apareṇa samayena tasmin gṛhe nirgranthā bhuñjate, sā
T09sumagavu:28: SumAv_16: tayā te nirgranthāḥ kākapakṣamalinā malapaṭalavastrā durgandhaśarīrā nagnāḥ pretasadṛśā dṛṣṭvā ca punar durmanāḥ saṃvṛttā.
T09sumagavu:29: SumAv_17: sā śvaśruṇocyate: dārike, kimarthaṃ parikhinnāsīti. sā provāca:

T09sumagavu:31: SumAv_18: sā kathayati: dārike, 'sti kaścid ebhyo 'nyaḥ prativiśiṣṭataraḥ śāstā loke.

T09sumagavu:35: vihartavyam, tasmin samaye 'kāmakānāṃ jñātīnām sāśrukaṇṭhānāṃ rudanmukhānāṃ keśaśmaśrūṇy avatārya kāśāyāṇi vastrāṇy ācchādya samyag eva śraddhayāgārād anagārikāṃ pravrajitaḥ.

T09sumagavu:38: sūryasahasrātirekaprabhaḥ, jaṅgama iva ratnaparvataḥ samantato bhadrako 'bhirūpako darśanīyaḥ

T09sumagavu:45: SumAv_24: pūrvābhilāpī sa bhagavān priyabhāṣī, uttānamukhavarṇo vigatabhṛkuṭiḥ smitapūrvaṃgamaḥ. ehīti svāgatavādī, kalyāṇavākyaḥ sa bhagavān bāhyakaraṇopetaś, citrakathaḥ sa bhagavān madhurakathaḥ,
T09sumagavu:47: SumAv_25: āryadharmatayā nyāyadharmatayā virajadharmatayā atuladharmatayā labdhasahāyaḥ sa bhagavān, bahavo 'sya sahāyakāḥ śīlasaṃpannāḥ samādhisaṃpannāḥ prajñāsaṃpannā vimuktisaṃpannā vimuktijñānasaṃpannāḥ.
T09sumagavu:48: SumAv_26: punar aparaṃ; sa bhagavān yaṃ grāmakṣetram upaniśritya viharati,
T09sumagavu:49: na tatra manuṣyā amanuṣyā vā viheṭhayanti, kālena kālaṃ divyāni rūpāṇi
T09sumagavu:50: dṛśyante, divyāḥ śabdāḥ śrūyante, udārāś cāvabhāsāḥ prajñāyante, devaḥ kālena kālaṃ samyag vāridhārām anuprayacchatīti.
T09sumagavu:51: SumAv_27: tasyāḥ sahaśravaṇād eva bhagavato 'ntike cittam abhiprasannaṃ,
T09sumagavu:52: sā prasannacittā kathayati: dārike, śakyasi tvaṃ taṃ bhagavantam asmākam upadarśayitum.
T09sumagavu:53: SumAv_28: sā kathayati: ārye, tena hi tvaṃ bhaktaṃ sajjīkuru, śvo 'haṃ
T09sumagavu:54: bhagavantam ānayisyāmīti. mūṣilapatnī kathayati: sādhu, sarvaṃ sajjitam iti.

T09sumagavu:449: SumAv_222: na tathā dvādaśavarṣābhyastaḥ śamathacittasya kalyatāṃ janayati, rājyābhinandino vā tatprathamato rājyābhiṣekaḥ, aputrasya vā putrapratilambhaḥ, daridrasya vā nidhidarśanaṃ, yathāvāropitaṃ kuśalamūlānāṃ tatprathamato buddhadarśanam.
T09sumagavu:450: SumAv_223: atha te ṛṣayo yena bhagavāṃs tenopasaṃkrāntā, upasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvaikānte tasthuḥ.
T09sumagavu:451: SumAv_224: tato bhagavatā teṣām ṛṣīṇām āśayānuśayaṃ dhātuṃ prakṛtiṃ ca jñātvā tādṛśī caturāryasatyasaṃprativedhikā dharmadeśanā kṛtā, yāṃ śrutvā tair ṛṣibhir viṃśatiśikharasamudgataṃ satkāyadṛṣṭiśailaṃ jñānavajreṇa bhittvā śrotaāpattiphalaṃ sākṣāt kṛtam.
T09sumagavu:452: SumAv_225: atha te ṛṣayo buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ paricārya saṃprasthitāḥ.
T09sumagavu:453: SumAv_226: tena khalu samayena puṇḍravardhane nagare 'ṣṭādaśa dvārāṇy
T09sumagavu:455: SumAv_227: atha bhagavata etad abhavat: yad ahaṃ paścimena dvāreṇa
T09sumagavu:456: pravekṣyāmi, anyadvāranivāsināṃ nāgarāṇām anyathātvaṃ bhaviṣyati, yan nv aham aṣṭādaśa buddhān abhinirmāya svayaṃ paścimena dvāreṇa praveśayam iti.
T09sumagavu:457: SumAv_228: atha bhagavān aṣṭādaśa buddhān abhinirmāyā svayaṃ paścimena dvāreṇa praviṣṭaḥ.
T09sumagavu:458: SumAv_229: bhagavataḥ purapraveśe evaṃrūpāṇy āścaryāṇy atyadbhutāni bhavanty anyāni ca: tadyathonnatonnatāḥ pṛthivīpradeśāḥ avanamanty
T09sumagavu:459: avanatāś connamanti, apagatapāṣānaśarkarakaṭhalyā bhavanti, nīcāni dvārāṇy uccībhavanti, saṃkṣiptāni viśālībhavanti, hastinaḥ kūjanti, aśvā heṣante,
T09sumagavu:460: uṣṭrāḥ krośante, gāvo rambhante, vṛṣabhā nandante, mayūrāḥ kekāyante,
T09sumagavu:461: gṛhagatāni ca vividhāni vādyabhāṇḍāni svayaṃ nadanti, andhāś cakṣūṃsi pratilabhante, badhirāḥ śṛṇvanti, mūkāḥ pravyāhārasamarthā bhavanti,
T09sumagavu:463: madyamadanākṣiptā vimadī bhavanti, viṣapītā nirviṣā bhavanti,
T09sumagavu:464: anyonyavairiṇo maitrīṃ pratilabhante, garbhiṇyaḥ svastinā prasūyante,
T09sumagavu:466: SumAv_230: evaṃvidhayā vibhūtyā praviśya yena sumāgadhāyā niveśanaṃ
T09sumagavu:468: SumAv_231: atha sumāgadhā svayam eva gośīrṣacandanodakena bhṛṅgāraṃ
T09sumagavu:469: pūrayitvā bhagavataḥ pādodakam anuprayacchati bhikṣusaṃghasya ca.
T09sumagavu:470: SumAv_232: tataḥ sumāgadhā bhagavataḥ pādayor nipatyaivam āha:
T09sumagavu:471: dhanyās te paravādivādamathanaṃ paśyanti ye te mukhaṃ vistīrṇe sadasi sthitasya vacanaṃ śṛṇvanti ye vā mudā /
T09sumagavu:472: lābhas tasya mahān bhaviṣyati ca yaḥ pādau tava śrīnidher mūrdhnā caiva karadvayena vinayāt saṃpīḍya vandiṣyate //
T09sumagavu:473: SumAv_233: atha bhagavān purastād bhikṣusaṃghasya prajñapta evāsane
T09sumagavu:474: niṣaṇṇaḥ, sukhopaviṣṭaṃ buddhapramukhaṃ bhikṣusaṃghaṃ viditvā śucinā praṇītena khādanīyena bhojanīyena svahastena saṃtarpayati saṃpravārayati.
T09sumagavu:475: SumAv_234: atha puṇḍravardhananivāsī janakāyo bhagavantam apaśyaṃs tadgṛhaṃ bhettum ārabdhaḥ. tato bhagavatā tadgṛhaṃ sphaṭikamayam
T09sumagavu:476: abhinirmitaṃ, yataḥ sarvo mahājanakāya ādarśanagatam iva bhagavantaṃ
T09sumagavu:479: sphaṭikamayam abhūt tad eva ramyaṃ maṇikanakākṣaratnabhakticitraṃ /
T09sumagavu:480: sthitam iva purato munīndracandraṃ nagarajano 'pi nirīkṣate samagraḥ //
T09sumagavu:481: SumAv_236: prasādāromāñcitasarvagātrāḥ kṛtāñjaliṃ mūrdhni nipātya hastam /
T09sumagavu:482: narā namanti sma munīndracandraṃ surā ivendraṃ bhavanodarastham //
T09sumagavu:483: SumAv_237: atha bhagavān kṛtabhaktakṛtyaḥ purastād bhikṣusaṃghasya prajñapta evāsane niṣaṇṇaḥ.
T09sumagavu:484: SumAv_238: tataḥ sumāgadhāpramukho 'ntarjanakāyas te ca nāgarās te ca ṛṣayas te ca devāsuragaruḍayakṣagandharvakinnaramahoragā bhagavantaṃ parivāryāvasthitāḥ.
T09sumagavu:485: SumAv_239: tato bhagavatā teṣāṃ ca tādṛśī caturāryasatyasaṃpravedhikī
T09sumagavu:486: dharmadeśanā kṛtā, yāṃ śrutvā kaiścic chrotaāpattiphalaṃ sākṣāt kṛtaṃ,
T09sumagavu:487: kaiścit sakṛdāgāmiphalaṃ, kaiścid anāgāmiphalam, kaiścit pravrajya sarvakleśaprahāṇād arhattvaṃ sākṣāt kṛtaṃ, kaiścid ūṣmagatāni kuśalamūlāni
T09sumagavu:489: kaiścic chrāvakabodhau cittāny utpāditāni, kaiścit pratyekāyāṃ bodhau,
T09sumagavu:490: kaiścid anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau, kaiścic charaṇagamanāni gṛhītāni,
T09sumagavu:492: SumAv_240: yad bhūyasā sā parṣad buddhanimnā dharmapravaṇā saṃghaprāgbhārā
T09sumagavu:494: SumAv_241: yadā bhagavataitat sūtraṃ bhāṣitaṃ, tadā bhikṣavo bhagavantam
T09sumagavu:495: evam āhuḥ: āścaryaṃ bhagavann, āścaryaṃ sugata, yat sumāgadhayā bhagavantaṃ kalyāṇamitram āgamya buddhakāryaṃ kṛtam iti.
T09sumagavu:496: SumAv_242: bhagavān āha: na bhikṣava etarhy eva yathātīte 'py adhvani buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ kalyāṇamitram āgamya kāñcanamālayā yad buddhakāryaṃ kṛtaṃ, tac chṛṇuta, sādhu ca suṣṭhu ca manasi kurute, bhāṣiṣye.
T09sumagavu:497: SumAv_243: bhūtapūrvaṃ, bhikṣavo, 'tīte 'dhvani viṃśativarṣasahasrāyuṣi prajāyāṃ kāśyapo nāma śāstā loka udapādi, tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho vidyācaraṇasaṃpannaḥ sugato lokavid anuttaraḥ puruṣadamyasārathiḥ śāstā devānāṃ ca manuṣyāṇāṃ ca buddho bhagavān, sa bārāṇasīṃ nagarīm upaniśritya viharati ṛṣivadane mṛgadāve.
T09sumagavu:498: SumAv_244: tena khalu punaḥ samayena kṛkī nāma rājā babhūva.
T09sumagavu:499: SumAv_245: tasya duhitā kāñcanamālayā śirasi baddhayā jātā, tasyā mātāpitṛbhyāṃ kāñcanamāleti nāma kṛtam.
T09sumagavu:500: SumAv_246: sā unnītā vardhitā mahatī saṃvṛttā, rājñaḥ kṛkina iṣṭā kāntā priyā manāpā saṃvṛttā.
T09sumagavu:501: SumAv_247: sā pañcaśataparivārā bhagavato darśanāyopasaṃkrāntā, tasyā bhagavatā dharmo deśitaḥ.
T09sumagavu:502: SumAv_248: tayā taṃ dharmaṃ śrutvā bhagavato 'nitike mahān cittaprasāda utpanno, bhagavāṃś ca tayā yāvajjīvaṃ cīvarapiṇḍapātraśayanāsanaglānapratyayabhaiṣajyapariṣkāraḥ pracāritah.
T09sumagavu:503: SumAv_249: tena khalu punaḥ samayena rājñā kṛkinā daśa svapnā dṛṣṭāḥ:
T09sumagavu:515: SumAv_250: taṃ dṛṣṭvā ca punar bhītaś trastaś cintayati: mā me itonidānaṃ
T09sumagavu:516: rājyāc cyutir bhaviṣyati jīvitasya cāntarāya iti.
T09sumagavu:517: SumAv_251: tato rājñā svapnādhyāyavido brāhmaṇān āhūya svapnān
T09sumagavu:519: SumAv_252: te kāñcanamālāṃ dṛṣṭvā kathayanti: rājan, yā te sarvajanapriyā
T09sumagavu:520: tasyā rudhireṇa yajño yaṣṭavyaḥ, antrair nagaraṃ veṣṭavyam, evaṃ devasya śreyo bhaviṣyati, svapnān dāruṇān dṛṣṭvā rājyajīvitahāriṇo 'nenopāyena
T09sumagavu:522: SumAv_253: rājā saṃlakṣayati: sarvajanapriyā me kāñcanamālā, tāṃ vyāpādayitukāmā brāhmaṇā evam āhuḥ. varaṃ mamaiva maraṇaṃ, na tu kāñcanamālāṃ vyāpādayiṣyāmīti.
T09sumagavu:523: SumAv_254: kare kapolaṃ dattvā cintāparo vyavasthitaḥ, kāñcanamālayā
T09sumagavu:524: dṛṣṭaḥ. sā kathayati: kim evaṃ cintāparo, deva, iti. tena sa vṛttānto
T09sumagavu:525: vistareṇa niveditaḥ. sā kathayati: eṣa bhagavān kāśyapaḥ samyaksaṃbuddho bārāṇasīm upaniśritya viharati ṛṣivadane mṛgadāve, taṃ bhagavantaṃ gatvā
T09sumagavu:526: pṛcchatha. yathā te bhagavān vyākaroti tathaivaṃ dhāraya.
T09sumagavu:527: SumAv_255: tato rājā mahatā śrīsamudāyena kāñcanamālayā sārdhaṃ barāṇasyā nirgatya yena bhagavāṃs tenopasaṃkrāntaḥ, upasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādau
T09sumagavu:528: śirasā vanditvaikānte niṣaṇṇaḥ, kāñcanamālāpi, anyāni ca brāhmaṇagṛhapatiśatasahasrāṇi.
T09sumagavu:529: SumAv_256: atha bhagavān kṛkinaṃ rājānaṃ dharmayā kathayā saṃdarśayati samādāpayati samuttejayati saṃpraharṣayati. anekaparyāyeṇa dharmayā kathayā saṃdarśya samādāpya samuttejya saṃpraharṣya tūṣṇīṃ babhūva.
T09sumagavu:530: SumAv_257: atha kṛkī rājā daśa svapnān nivedyaivam āha: mā me, bhagavaṃs,
T09sumagavu:531: tatonidānaṃ rājyāc cyutir bhaviṣyati jīvitasya cāntarāya iti.
T09sumagavu:532: SumAv_258: bhagavān āha: mā bhaiṣīs tvaṃ, mahāraja, na tavetonidānaṃ rājyāc cyutir bhaviṣyatīti jīvitasya cāntarāyaḥ.
T09sumagavu:533: (1) yat tvaṃ, mahārāja, svapnam adrākṣīr, vātāyanena hastī nirgacchan
T09sumagavu:534: puccho lagna iti, bhaviṣyaty anāgate 'dhvani varṣaśatāyuṣi prajāyāṃ śākyamunir nāma tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ, sa sakalaṃ buddhakāryaṃ
T09sumagavu:536: tasya parinirvṛtasya paścime kāle aśrāddhā brāhmaṇagṛhapatayas, te rudanto 'śrumukhān bandhūn utsṛjya pravrajya vihāreṣu gṛhasaṃjñām utpādayiṣyanti,
T09sumagavu:538: (2) yat tvaṃ punaḥ svapnam adrākṣīs, tṛṣitasya pṛṣṭhataḥ kūpo dhāvati,
T09sumagavu:539: tasyaiva śravakā dharmaṃ deśayiṣyanti śraddhānāṃ gṛhapatīnāṃ, te satṛṣṇā eva prakramiṣyanti, tasyaitat pūrvanimittam.
T09sumagavu:540: (3) yat tvaṃ svapnam adrākṣīr, muktāprasthena śaktuprasthaṃ krīyamāṇam
T09sumagavu:541: iti, tasyaiva śrāvakāḥ śaktuprasthasya hetor indriyabalabodhyaṅgāni saṃprakāśayiṣyanti, tasyaitat pūrvanimittam.
T09sumagavu:542: (4) yat tvaṃ svapnam adrākṣīś, candanaṃ kāṣṭhārgheṇa samīkriyamāṇaṃ,
T09sumagavu:543: tasyaiva śrāvakās taṃ tīrthikavākyam anugṛhya saddharmeṇa samīkariṣyanti,
T09sumagavu:545: (5) yat tvaṃ svapnam adrākṣīr, gandhahastī kalabhair vitrāsyata iti,
T09sumagavu:546: tasyaiva śrāvakā asaṃyatās te śīlavanto bhikṣūn niṣkāśayiṣyanti, tasyaitat
T09sumagavu:548: (6) yat tvaṃ svapnam adrākṣīr, ārāmāṃ puṣpaphalasaṃpannaṃ adattādāyibhir
T09sumagavu:549: apahriyamāṇaṃ, tasyaiva śrāvakā āryasaṃghasya pratipāditam ārāmaṃ saṃgham
T09sumagavu:550: ālaṃbīkṛtya kecid abhāvitakāyā abhāvitacittā abhāvitaprajñāḥ saṃghād ācchidya puṣpaphalaṃ svajanebhyo dāsyanti, tasyaitat pūrvanimittam.
T09sumagavu:551: (7) yat tvaṃ svapnam adrākṣīr, aśucimrakṣito markaṭaḥ parān upaliṃpyatīti,
T09sumagavu:552: tasyaiva śrāvakā abhāvitakāyā abhāvitacittā abhāvitaprajñā ātmanāpattim āpannāḥ śrāddhānām api bhikṣūṇām āpattiṃ vyavasthāpayiṣyanti, tasyaitat
T09sumagavu:554: (8) yat tvaṃ svapnam adrākṣīr, markaṭasya rājyābhiṣekaḥ, tasmin samaye vikalendriyā api rājāno bhaviṣyanti, tasyaitat pūrvanimittam.
T09sumagavu:555: (9) yat tvaṃ svapnam adrākṣīḥ, paṭo 'ṣṭādaśabhir janair ākṛṣyate na ca śīryata iti, tasya parinirvṛtasya śāsanam aṣṭādaśabhedabhinnaṃ bhaviṣyati,
T09sumagavu:556: na ca śakyati vimuktipaṭaṃ pāṭayituṃ, tasyaitat pūrvanimittam.
T09sumagavu:557: (10) yat tvaṃ svapnam adrākṣīr, mahājanakāyaś caikatra saṃnipatya
T09sumagavu:558: kalahabhaṇḍena vivādavigrahenātināmayanti, tasya śāsane asaṃyatā bhikṣavaḥ
T09sumagavu:560: mā bhaiṣīs tvaṃ, mahārāja, na tavetonidānaṃ rājyāc cyutir bhaviṣyati jīvitāntarāyo vā.
T09sumagavu:561: SumAv_259: tato bhagavatā tasya rājñas tasya ca mahājanakāyasya tādṛśī caturāryasatyasaṃprativedhikī dharmadeśanā kṛtā, yāṃ śrutvā caturaśītyā
T09sumagavu:563: SumAv_260: kāñcanamālayā bhagavantaṃ kalyāṇamitram āgamya buddhakāryaṃ kṛtam.
T09sumagavu:564: SumAv_261: kiṃ manyadhve, bhikṣavaḥ yāsau kāñcanamālā iyam eva sā
T09sumagavu:566: SumAv_262: bhikṣavaḥ saṃśayajātāḥ sarvasaṃśayacchettāraṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ papracchuḥ: kiṃ bhadanta, kāñcanamālayā karma kṛtaṃ yenāḍhye kule pratyajātā yena kāñcanamālayā śirasi baddhayā jātā iti.
T09sumagavu:567: SumAv_263: bhagavān āha: kāñcanamālayaiva, bhikṣavaḥ, pūrvam anyāsu jātiṣu
T09sumagavu:568: karmāṇi kṛtāni upacitāni labdhasaṃbhārāṇi pariṇatapratyayāny oghavat pratyupasthitāny avaśyaṃbhāvīni. kāñcanamālayaiva, bhikṣavaḥ, karmāṇi kṛtāni upacitāni. ko 'nyaḥ pratyanubhaviṣyati. na, bhikṣavaḥ, karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitāni bāhyapṛthivīdhātau vipacyante, nābdhātau, na tejodhātau,
T09sumagavu:569: na vāyudhātāv, api tūpātteṣu eva skandhadhātvāyataneṣu karmāṇi kṛtāni
T09sumagavu:571: SumAv_264: na pranaśyanti karmāṇi kalpakoṭiśatair api /
T09sumagavu:572: sāmagrīṃ prāpya kālaṃ ca phalanti khalu dehinām //
T09sumagavu:573: SumAv_265: bhūtapūrvam, bhikṣavo, 'tīte 'dhvani bārāṇasyāṃ mahānagaryām anyatamā daridrā strī, tayā pratyekabuddhasya caitye nānāvicitrāṃ palālamālāṃ granthayitvā samāropya prasannacittayā praṇidhānaṃ kṛtam.
T09sumagavu:574: SumAv_266: anenāhaṃ kuśalamūlena cittotpādena deyadharmaparityāgena ca yatrayatropapadye 'haṃ tatratatra kāñcanamālayā śirasi baddhayā jāyeyam iti. kiṃ manyadhve, bhikṣavaḥ. yāsau daridrā strī, iyam asau kāñcanamālā.
T09sumagavu:575: yad anayā prasannacittayā praṇidhānaṃ kṛtaṃ, tena pañcajanmaśatāni kāñcanamālayā śirasi baddhayā jātā.
T09sumagavu:576: SumAv_267: paṇadvayaṃ ca tayā paṭāntāvabaddhaṃ vimucyāryasaṃghāya dattaṃ;
T09sumagavu:578: SumAv_268: atha bhagavān sumāgadhāpramukhaṃ puṇḍravardhananivāsinaṃ mahājanakāyam abhiprasādya prakrāntaḥ, tathaiva rddhyā sārdhaṃ
T09sumagavu:580: SumAv_269: iti hi, bhikṣava, ekāntakṛṣṇānāṃ karmaṇām ekāntakṛṣṇo vipākaḥ,
T09sumagavu:581: ekāntaśuklānām ekāntaśuklo, vyatimiśrāṇāṃ vyatimiśraḥ. tasmāt tarhi,
T09sumagavu:582: bhikṣava, ekāntakṛṣṇāni karmāṇy apāsya vyatimiśrāṇi ca, ekāntaśukleṣv eva karmasv ābhogaḥ karaṇīya iti. tasmāt tarhi, bhikṣava, evaṃ śikṣitavyam,
T09sumagavu:583: yac chāstāraṃ satkariṣyāmo gurukariṣyāmo mānayiṣyāmaḥ pūjayiṣyāma ity evaṃ vo, bhikṣavaḥ,
T09sumagavu:584: SumAv_270: idam avocad bhagavān āttamanās, te ca bhikṣavo bhagavato bhāṣitam abhyanandann iti. sumāgadhāvadānaṃ samāptam.
